The first release of Deathlike Silence Productions. Although the album was recorded and copyrighted in 1989, the album was not released until 1990. Some sources say February 1990, Merciless' official bio says March 1990.
The first (of all the nine altogether) releases of Deathlike Silence which are all very, very rare and expensive. Deathlike Silence founded by Euronymous (aka ÃƒËœystein Aarseth) in the late 1980's and lasted until his murder in 1993. This is the debut of SwedenÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Merciless, one of the pioneers of the Death Metal scene soon to emerge in their country. The album is simply a masterpiece blending influences from Possessed, Slayer, Kreator, old Bathory and adding their own craft
